ROOT:
-- DaoCategories_D3_Update -- 2013/1/10 日立 太郎 UPDATE [Categories] SET
[CategoryID] = @Set_CategoryID_forUPD, [CategoryName] = @Set_CategoryName_forUPD, [Description] = @Set_Description_forUPD, [Picture] = @Set_Picture_forUPD,
WHERE AND [CategoryID] = @CategoryIDAND [CategoryID] IS NULL AND [CategoryName] = @CategoryNameAND [CategoryName] IS NULL AND [Description] = @DescriptionAND [Description] IS NULL AND [Picture] = @PictureAND [Picture] IS NULL
